name: Karina
description: '''Mar√≠a Isabel Llaudes Santiago''' (born 4 December 1945), better known by her stage name '''Karina''', is a Spanish singer and actress who had her biggest success from the late 1960s until the mid-1970s in Spain and Latin America. She {{Esccnty|Spain|t=represented Spain}} at the [[Eurovision Song Contest 1971]] with the song "{{lang|es|[[En un mundo nuevo]]|i=no}}", where she placed second.
